class_descriptions.pizza: A flatbread typically topped with tomato sauce and cheese
class_descriptions.pasta: Dish made from pasta dough, often served with sauce
class_descriptions.sushi: Japanese dish consisting of vinegared rice with fish or vegetables
class_descriptions.burger: Sandwich consisting of a patty, typically served in a bun
class_descriptions.taco: Mexican dish consisting of a folded tortilla filled with various ingredients
class_descriptions.curry: Spiced dish originating from the Indian subcontinent
class_descriptions.soup: Liquid food made by cooking ingredients in stock or water
class_descriptions.sandwich: Food item consisting of filling between slices of bread
class_descriptions.pancake: Flat cake, often thin and round, prepared from a batter
class_descriptions.ice cream: Frozen dessert made from dairy products
class_descriptions.bread: Staple food prepared from a dough of flour and water
class_descriptions.rice: Grain used as a staple food
